description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. It's high flying fun in Charlie Cat's Hot Air Balloon Adventure! The bad Thomas Cat is up to his old tricks and it's up to Charlie Cat and his hot air balloon and apple cannon to stop him. Fight off enemy cat jets, rockets, cannons, lighting beams, a whole assortment of fun enemies in 10 different levels. Featuring photo realistic cat graphics, Charlie cat is a fun, quirky, game!
